TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit XPathResult extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Contains the value returned by an XPath query.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example creates a message and XPath message queries. The queries are evaluated by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.XPathMessageQuery> objects contained in an <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathMessageQueryCollection> object. The results of each query are tested using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathResult.ResultType%2A> property of the XPathResult class.
[!code-vb[XPathMessageQuery#0](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.servicemodel.di_1_1.vb)] [!code-cs[XPathMessageQuery#0](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.servicemodel.di_1_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

Docs.summary: Releases all resources owed by the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool GetResultAsBoolean() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the result of the XPath query as a Boolean value.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator GetResultAsNodeset() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the result of the XPath query as an enumerable set of nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator.MoveNext%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator> class within a loop to see the value of each node.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance float64 GetResultAsNumber() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the result of the XPath query as a number.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string GetResultAsString() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the result of the XPath query as a string.
Returns the type of the value returned by the XPath query.
Docs.value: One of the enumeration values. To get the actual result, use the corresponding method. For example, if the value is , use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.XPathResult.GetResultAsNumber%2A> method.
